flawed_nl_solution:
The team is 10% girls because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=10>>10
The team has 20 girls because 50 x 0.4 = <<50*0.4=20>>20
The team has 10 junior girls because 20 / 2 = <<20/2=10>>10
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 10. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
